flowchart TB
    adcli(Ubuntu machine)
    adsys(ADSys)
    adcon(Active Directory controller)

    adcli --"authenticate user"--> adsys
    adsys --"fetch GPOs"--> adcon
    adcon --"relevant GPOs resolved"--> adsys
    adsys --"parse GPOs and apply"--> adcli
